Description: Limestone ostracon with remains of thirteen lines of Coptic text written in black ink on one side and a further fifteen lines of text on the other.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.93-94, pl.66)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82754) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82754)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 66:1 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
